description: Load a CSV file, CSV from a file path, or a valid CSV string and convert it to a list of Data

csv_file.info: Upload a CSV file to convert to a list of Data objects

csv_path.info: Provide the path to the CSV file as pure text

csv_string.info: Paste a CSV string directly to convert to a list of Data objects

text_key.info: The key to use for the text column. Defaults to 'text'.

errors.exactly_one_input: Please provide exactly one of: CSV file, file path, or CSV string.
errors.must_be_csv: The provided file must be a CSV file.
